mapper.select: SELECT r.review_code, r.review_title AS reviewTitle, r.review_body AS reviewBody, r.review_score AS reviewScore, res.restaurant_name AS restaurantName, u.user_name AS userName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT rp.review_picture_url) AS pictures FROM review r JOIN restaurant res ON r.restaurant_code = res.restaurant_code JOIN member u ON r.user_code = u.user_code LEFT JOIN review_picture rp ON r.review_code = rp.review_code WHERE r.restaurant_code = #{restaurantCode} GROUP BY r.review_code, r.review_title, r.review_body, r.review_score, res.restaurant_name, u.user_name ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
